key.name: local-only
key.description: Use only the local spam tests (no DNS).

key.name: command
key.summary: Full path command to run spamassassin
key.description: Full path to a spamassassin command. If not set, then a compile-time path is used, usually /usr/bin/spamassassin. The command should not contain any other arguments.

key.name: learn-command
key.summary: Full path command to run sa-learn
key.description: Full path to a sa-learn command. If not set, then a compile-time path is used, usually /usr/bin/sa-learn. The command should not contain any other arguments.
